Package org.ten60.netkernel.xml.transrepresentation

Class Summary
BinaryStreamToSAX Parses a binary stream into a SAX stream
BooleanToCanonicalXML Transrept a boolean to a canonical XML boolean document
CanonicalBooleanToBoolean transrepresent a canonical boolean document to a boolean
DOM2SAX Parses a binary stream into a SAX stream
DOMXDAParser Parses a binary stream into a DOM
DOMXDASerializer Serialise DOM to a binary stream
JDOM2DOMXDA Converts a JDOM to a DOM
JDOM2SAX Converts a JDOM to JDOMSAXAspect SAX event generator
JDOMSerializer Serialise JDOM to a binary stream, use special serializer if content is HTML.
NodeList2XML Attempts to map a node list to a primary XML type
NVPToXML Transrepresent Name Value Pair Proxy to XML
NVPToXMLBinaryStream Serialize a NVP to an XML binary stream
SAX2DOM Creates a DOMXDA Aspect from a SAX Stream
SAX2XmlObject Creates a XMLObject Aspect from a SAX Stream
SAXToBinaryStream Serialises a SAX stream into a binary stream
SerializedDOMAspect Serialise DOM to a binary stream
StAXReaderToXXX StAXReader transreptor - attempts to convert a StAXReader to any desired type.
URIToCanonicalURI Transrepresent a URI Aspect to a canonical URI document
XmlObject2DOMXDA Converts a XmlObject to a DOM
XmlObject2SAX Convert an XMLObject into a SAX stream
XmlObjectParser Parses a binary stream into a XMLObject
XmlObjectSerializer Serialise XMLObject to a binary stream
XMLToNVP Transrepresent From XML (first child elements - text values) to Name Value Pair
XXX2JDOM Converts several XML object models to JDOMAspect
XXX2XmlObject Converts several XML object models to XmlObjectAspect
XXXToStAXReader StAXReader transreptor - attempts to produce a StAXReaderAspect from any resource.
